author: jerome
msg: No more NullPointerException while logging the doc language if none

author: andreas
msg: Avoid NPE when DocumentHelper passes DTD information to the transformer. This fixes bug #36419. Thanks to Felix Roethenbacher.

author: ajith
msg: Added SOAP 1.2 support for the code generation. Now the SOAP 1.2 bindings are picked up correctly by the code generator (actually the WSDL pump) and the correct code is generated

author: rwatler
msg: - refine menu generation for hidden pages
- prevent session caching of menus generated for hidden pages
- prevent hidden pages from being added to folder "last page" history

author: jdcasey
msg: Adding system scope...uses scope == 'system' and systemPath in dependency. SystemPath was chosen over mappings inside the setings.xml for scalability, heritability, and injectability (via managed deps).
